name: Final Flight of STS Recovery
description:
Created For  the 48 hour Ludum Dare 43 - 11/30/2018 - 12/2/2018

Theme - Sacrifices must be made

You have been sent to Mars to recover a damaged science probe that Is stranded on the planet. Make contact and assist the on-board computer.  Repair parts from your own systems may be needed. However, the probe must be recovered at all costs.

WASD
Jump with space
Left click to shoot
Right click for sword
